description.zh-cn: 春秋后期齐国外交家、思想家。历任齐灵公、齐后庄公、齐景公三朝，辅政长达五十余年，以节俭、谦恭、机敏、善辩著称。其墓位于今山东省淄博市齐都镇永顺村东南。
description.en: A diplomat and thinker of the State of Qi in the late Spring and Autumn period. He served under Duke Ling, Duke Zhuang II, and Duke Jing of Qi for over fifty years, known for his frugality, humility, intelligence, and eloquence. His tomb is located southeast of Yongshun Village, Qidu Town, Zibo City, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴之父，宋穆公曾孙。因宋国内乱而到齐国，担任上大夫。
description.en: Father of Yan Ying and great-grandson of Duke Mu of Song. He went to the State of Qi due to civil strife in Song and served as a Shang Dafu (high-ranking minister).

description.zh-cn: 晏婴之子。
description.en: Son of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上从西周到春秋战国时期的一个诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state in Chinese history from the Western Zhou Dynasty to the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国君主，晏婴曾为其臣。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, under whom Yan Ying served.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国君主，晏婴曾为其臣，后被崔杼所杀。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, under whom Yan Ying served. He was later assassinated by Cui Zhu.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国君主，晏婴曾为其臣并多次劝谏他。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, under whom Yan Ying served and whom he frequently advised.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国大夫，因妻子与齐后庄公通奸而将其谋杀。
description.en: A Dafu (minister) of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period who assassinated Duke Zhuang II of Qi for having an affair with his wife.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上从西周到战国时期的诸侯国，晏婴的祖籍地。
description.en: A vassal state in Chinese history from the Western Zhou Dynasty to the Warring States period, the ancestral home of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期宋国君主，晏弱的曾祖父。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Song during the Spring and Autumn period and the great-grandfather of Yan Ruo.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上从西周到战国时期的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state in Chinese history from the Western Zhou Dynasty to the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期楚国君主，晏婴出使楚国时曾与其会面。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Chu during the Spring and Autumn period, whom Yan Ying met during his diplomatic mission to Chu.

description.zh-cn: 春秋末期的思想家、政治家、教育家，儒家学派创始人。曾称赞晏婴。
description.en: A thinker, politician, and educator of the late Spring and Autumn period, founder of Confucianism. He praised Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期贤士，曾被囚禁，后为晏婴所救并待为上客。
description.en: A worthy scholar of the Spring and Autumn period who was imprisoned and later rescued by Yan Ying, who treated him as an honored guest.

en: Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches

description.zh-cn: 一则历史典故，讲述晏婴设计，齐景公执行，用两个桃子让三位恃功而骄的大将自相残杀的事件。
description.en: A historical anecdote about a plot devised by Yan Ying and executed by Duke Jing of Qi to eliminate three arrogant generals by having them kill each other over two peaches.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公时期的大将，在“二桃杀三士”事件中自刎身亡。
description.en: A general under Duke Jing of Qi who committed suicide during the 'Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches' incident.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公时期的大将，在“二桃杀三士”事件中自刎身亡。
description.en: A general under Duke Jing of Qi who committed suicide during the 'Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches' incident.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公时期的大将，在“二桃杀三士”事件中自刎身亡。
description.en: A general under Duke Jing of Qi who committed suicide during the 'Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches' incident.

description.zh-cn: 晏圉是晏婴的儿子。
description.en: Yan Yu was the son of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴是晏弱的儿子。
description.en: Yan Ying was the son of Yan Ruo.

description.zh-cn: 晏弱是宋穆公的曾孙。
description.en: Yan Ruo was the great-grandson of Duke Mu of Song.

description.zh-cn: 晏弱因宋国内乱而到齐国担任上大夫。
description.en: Yan Ruo went to the State of Qi due to civil strife in Song and served as a Shang Dafu (high-ranking minister).

description.zh-cn: 晏婴在父亲晏弱病死后，继任为上大夫，后成为齐国相国。
description.en: After his father Yan Ruo died, Yan Ying succeeded him as Shang Dafu and later became the Chancellor of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴曾辅佐齐灵公。
description.en: Yan Ying served as a minister to Duke Ling of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴曾辅佐齐后庄公。
description.en: Yan Ying served as a minister to Duke Zhuang II of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴曾辅佐齐景公，辅政长达五十余年。
description.en: Yan Ying served as a minister to Duke Jing of Qi for over fifty years.

description.zh-cn: 因齐后庄公与自己的妻子通奸，崔杼设局谋杀了庄公。
description.en: Because Duke Zhuang II of Qi had an affair with his wife, Cui Zhu set a trap and assassinated the duke.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴出使楚国时，与楚灵王会面并进行了言语交锋。
description.en: During his diplomatic mission to the State of Chu, Yan Ying met with King Ling of Chu and engaged in a battle of wits.

description.zh-cn: 通过劝谏，使齐景公停止了奢侈的宫室修建工程。
description.en: Through admonition, he caused Duke Jing of Qi to halt the construction of extravagant palaces.

description.zh-cn: 在天降大雪时劝谏齐景公，使其下令向国人发放粮食。
description.en: He advised Duke Jing of Qi during a heavy snowfall, leading the duke to order the distribution of grain to the people.

description.zh-cn: 孔丘称赞晏婴，说他“善与人交，久而敬之”，“果君子也”。
description.en: Confucius praised Yan Ying, saying he was 'good at interacting with people and was respected over time' and was 'truly a gentleman'.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴将囚禁中的贤士越石父赎出，并待其为贵宾。
description.en: Yan Ying rescued the worthy scholar Yue Shifu from imprisonment and treated him as an honored guest.

description.zh-cn: 为除去恃功而骄的三位大将，向齐景公献策“二桃杀三士”。
description.en: To eliminate three arrogant generals, he proposed the 'Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches' plot to Duke Jing of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公采纳了晏婴的计策，通过赏赐两个桃子来引发三位大将的争斗，最终导致了他们的死亡。
description.en: Duke Jing of Qi adopted Yan Ying's plan, using two peaches as a reward to incite conflict among the three generals, which ultimately led to their deaths.

description.zh-cn: 公孙接在“二桃杀三士”事件中，因自觉功劳不及他人且羞愧，自刎身亡。
description.en: In the 'Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches' incident, Gongsun Jie committed suicide out of shame, feeling his merits were inferior.

description.zh-cn: 田开疆在“二桃杀三士”事件中，因自觉功劳不及他人且羞愧，自刎身亡。
description.en: In the 'Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches' incident, Tian Kaijiang committed suicide out of shame, feeling his merits were inferior.

description.zh-cn: 古冶子在“二桃杀三士”事件中，见到另外两人自杀后，感到羞愧，也自刎身亡。
description.en: In the 'Killing Three Warriors with Two Peaches' incident, after seeing the other two commit suicide, Gu Yezi felt ashamed and also killed himself.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴出生于齐国莱地夷维，即今高密县。
description.en: Yan Ying was born in Yiwei, Lai region, State of Qi, which corresponds to modern-day Gaomi County.
